name: ClarityUI.Alert

aliases.name: AlertItem
aliases.comment: Item to pass to an alert

types.name: AlertType
types.comment: Alert Type. Either Danger, Warning, Info or Success

values.name: alert
values.comment:
Main Alert Entry Point. Creates a clarity alert.

Documentation about Clarity Alerts: <https://vmware.github.io/clarity/documentation/alerts#top>
values.type: ClarityUI.Alert.AlertType -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> ClarityUI.Alert.AlertItem -> Html.Html msg

values.name: alertAppDanger
values.comment:
Alert App Danger.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible danger app alert.

values.comment:
Alert App Info.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible Info app alert.

Alert App Success.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible Success app alert.

values.name: alertAppWarning

Alert App Warning.
Curried Shortcut for a dismissible warning app alert.

Alert Danger.
